programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: In the final week of Maine's deer season, some hunters are desperate to bag a buck. Warden Robertson confronts a felon with an illegal gun and a pile of bait. Warden Carter investigates teen hunters terrorizing a neighborhood.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The wardens wage a large-scale investigation into a moose that's been shot and left in the woods. A camouflaged ATV leads Warden Richardson to a convicted felon. Warden MacCabe runs across a hunter unlike any other.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Anything can happen in Maine's 17 million acres of rugged wilderness. Angry hunters get loud with Warden Lounder over an illegal deer. Warden MacCabe enlists a 90-year-old local to help catch a deer baiter. A missing hunter sets off a full-scale search.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Fair chase is the gold standard of hunting, and in Maine, it's the law. Sgt. Simmons and Warden McKenney pursue a pair of brothers with bait piles. Warden Carter hunts for a father who may be teaching his son to poach. Warden Cross snares a trap thief.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: McKenney and Robertson investigate a night hunting complaint. MacCabe tracks an illegal bear kill back to the source. K9 Tundra takes the lead in the harrowing search for a missing elderly man with dementia.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: Hop aboard the Indian Pacific for a four-day, 4,352-kilometre transcontinental journey across Australia, a trip which features the world's longest straight stretch of railway and steepest incline railway.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: Travel on the State Railway of Thailand, and explore the famed 'Death Railway'. The trains travel through ancient areas, historic tunnels, and raging rivers.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: Board South Africa's Rovos Rail for a journey from Pretoria to Cape Town in classic carriages pulled by a series of steam, diesel and electric locomotives.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: We check out Switzerland's Bernina Express, which is one of the world's most beautiful train journeys, especially in winter. One of three railway lines on the UNESCO World Heritage List, it navigates 55 tunnels and nearly 200 viaducts and bridges.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: It's dove season in Texas, the start of hunting season. In Beaumont, road hunters get an early start on deer season during a decoy sting. Near Texarkana, a rogue gator is lassoed. On the Gulf Coast, undersized angling means citations.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Two new rookies from the 59th cadet class of Texas Game Wardens work their first cases. Game wardens rescue softshell turtles caught on illegal trotlines on Llano River. In East Texas, the search is on for a hunter lost in the Big Thicket Preserve.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens beef up patrols for the short pronghorn season. A deer needs to be captured and relocated from an industrial site, and an injured hawk is rushed to a rehabber. Near Port Aransas, Game Wardens check duck hunters on the bay.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Down on the Mexican border, Game Wardens pull in an illegal gill net. A group caught trespassing is found with firearms and narcotics. In East Texas, Game Wardens question a man suspected of illegally hunting on private property.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Warden Marshall leads the charge on a poaching investigation. Warden Richards visits an allegedly illegal snake breeder. Wardens Gould and Hickerson try to save an injured pelican, while Warden Miller brings a caracara bird to rehab.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Jamie attempts to lure back former lead operator Colin McLean by ordering his dream truck. Team Reliable tackles a smashed semi with a super-sized load of French fries. A blown tire launches a dump truck into the ditch and two teams into action.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: It's summertime in Texas. Game Wardens handle a speeding jet ski, drunk boaters, angry campers, and a rowdy raccoon.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A playboy throws a party for an artist, only to end up impaled on a wall with a model. The woman is killed but he survives. Mac must determine who was the intended target.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: An assistant district attorney is found shot to death in a cemetery but there is no sign of a bullet in his body or an exit wound. The investigation reveals that the man was involved in playing a bizarre assassination game.

programme.desc: Gregg Ritz competes with other hunters on a public land hunt in Nevada chasing a record Mule Deer.

programme.title: Realtree Outdoors
programme.desc: David Blanton along with his wife Lisa host Duck Commander's Justin Martin and his wife Brittany on a turkey hunt in North Texas. Headhunters Nate Hosie and Randy Birdsong also get in on the fun.

programme.title: Bone Collector
programme.desc: Michael Waddell and Nick Mundt are in Utah at the famous R&K Hunting Co. Chasing velvet mule deer with a stick and string.

programme.title: Buckmasters
programme.desc: Jackie hunts with a lucky sweepstakes hunter in Kansas. He then hunts Alabama with a crossbow.

programme.title: Primos Truth About Hunting
programme.desc: Jimmy Primos gets to hunt his favorite secret patch for deer, while Jordan Troy and Lake spend the rest of the week focused on ducks.

programme.title: Driven With Pat & Nicole
programme.desc: Pat and Nicole make the journey back to Canol Outfitters in Northwest Territories, enduring the elements, and whatever challenges the Mackenzie Mountains throw their way on the hunt for giant caribou.

programme.title: Addicted to the Outdoors
programme.desc: The Brunsons are heading out west to hunt with their good friend Fonzie at Four Horse Outfitters in Wyoming. This year Jon and Gina have decided to up their game and try to go after both Antelope and Mule Deer in the same trip.

programme.title: Ted Nugent Spirit of the Wild
programme.desc: The Queen of the Forest bowhunts Michigan for whitetail deer.

programme.title: Greg Zipadelli's Drop Zone
programme.desc: Hal Shaffer keeps working hard as the Missouri lease is shaping up for a great fall hunting season. But first, Hal is having shoulder surgery, and he hopes to be ready for that first day of bow season.

programme.title: The Lindsey Way
programme.desc: The Lindsey family is back in Pike County Illinois chasing big bucks. Follow along as Jeff takes it to the last night of the hunt.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Shock Therapy
programme.desc: Steve Pereira is by far one of the most popular guides to have aired on Jim Shockey's Unchartered Yukon series. This week Jim sits down with Steve to talk about how he met Jim and got into hunting.

programme.title: North American Whitetail
programme.desc: Stan Potts goes after an Illinois brute and discusses tactics for hunting crop harvests. Dr. Deer explains whitetail eyesight, and Gordon Whittington speaks with Steve Davis about his extraordinary Ohio buck.

programme.title: Live 2 Hunt With Cody & Kelsy
programme.desc: Cody finds a once in a lifetime king mulie but he already has his heart set on a different buck. He needs to find someone worthy of such a special animal.

programme.title: Crush With Lee & Tiffany
programme.desc: The annual trip to Utah provides one of the hardest hunts of the year. Brad Treu and Lee Lakosky go head to head versus the elusive mule deer.

programme.title: Headhunters TV
programme.desc: Randy Birdsong starts bowhunting elk in New Mexico and ends his season with a coveted Wyoming tag.

programme.title: Realtree Outdoors
programme.desc: David Blanton along with his wife Lisa host Duck Commander's Justin Martin and his wife Brittany on a turkey hunt in North Texas. Headhunters Nate Hosie and Randy Birdsong also get in on the fun.

programme.title: Primos Truth About Hunting

programme.title: Hank Parker's Outdoor Magazine
programme.desc: Hank is headed to South Carolina to spend a day with some of his favorite young pals at The Boy's Farm in Newberry. Part of a special series of shows, this episode inspires and energizes as Hank and the boys target stripers on beautiful Lake Murray.

programme.title: American Archer
programme.desc: Joe heads to Florida on a mission to eradicate feral hogs for the landowners.

programme.title: Inside Outdoors TV
programme.desc: Tim continues to focus on hunting the short October cold fronts in Kansas as he and Calahan finally outsmart the old buck called Junkyard.

programme.title: Whitetail Freaks
programme.desc: Don Kisky pulls back his bow and takes down a 161 buck for the number six spot. Don is on the board, and as always, shows us how to properly manage whitetails.

programme.title: Heartland Bowhunter
programme.desc: Shawn has been on a handful of elk hunts in his lifetime, most of which have ended without filling a tag. This year looks like it might be different after drawing two different highly coveted tags for New Mexico and Montana.

programme.title: In Fisherman TV
programme.desc: It's freshwater fishing action with emphasis on top tactical maneuvers, as the In-Fisherman staff go after smallmouth bass; the best lure choices for summer-peaking largemouth bass; new-age classic walleye lures.

programme.title: Lake Commandos
programme.desc: Guide Bret Alexander and Steve discover a cold-front has driven bass from the shallows, causing them to make major changes in location.

programme.desc: The Fowl Life crew heads north of the border and hunt with Take-Em Outfitters in Alberta, Canada.

programme.title: Gun Dog TV
programme.desc: The crew enjoys another unforgettable day in the uplands of Kansas.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: This week we're doing a little territory exploration. We're heading to Argentina Eva, Wojo and Dan Goodenow. They'll be going after, red stag and water buffalo.
